explains: adj. 博士的，博士学位的

sentences.en: Eric told me that they postponed having children until he gets his doctoral degree.
sentences.cn: 埃里克告诉我，直到他拿到博士学位后他们才会要孩子。

sentences.en: But the regular time it takes to get a doctoral degree in the humanities is nine years.
sentences.cn: 但获得人文学科的博士学位通常需要9年时间。

sentences.en: Today foreign students earn 30 percent of the doctoral degrees awarded in the United States and 38 percent of those in the United Kingdom.
sentences.cn: 如今，外国学生获得了美国30%的博士学位，38%在英国获得了博士学位。
